name: devops-dockerlab
description: Docker a node.js app by writing your own Dockerfile. # 1. Build the Docker image by running the following command docker build -t devops-dockerlab . # 2. Run a Docker container with limits on CPU and memory by running the following command: docker run -d -p 80:80 --name my-node-app --cpus 0.5 --memory 512m my-node-app # 3. # 4.Push your Docker image to Docker Hub by running the following command: docker tag devops-dockerlab dstakhurskyi/devops-dockerlab docker push dstakhurskyi/devops-dockerlab # 5.
